item.materialis.wrench.description:
The Wrench is a common tool among engineers. It can efficiently break machines and has room for many abilities.
Right Click: Rotate block
material.materialis.aluminum.encyclopedi: -10% attack damage, +20% attack speed per level
material.materialis.brass.encyclopedia: Adds +1 attack damage per level that degrades as durability goes down
material.materialis.cloggrum.encyclopedi: Repairing the tool costs up to half as much the higher the durability the tool has
material.materialis.ebony_psimetal.encyc: Adds up to 1 extra attack damage that scales with the amount of psi you have per level
material.materialis.fairy.encyclopedia: Adds the percentage of health lost multiplied by the level to your mining speed
material.materialis.fairy.flavor: From the fairy depths of hell.
material.materialis.forgotten_metal.ency: Deals 50% extra damage to undergarden mobs per level, +25% mining speed on undergarden blocks per level
material.materialis.forgotten_metal.flav: It's the uhhh umm, y- I uhhhh ermmmm...
material.materialis.froststeel.encyclope: Applies 7.5 seconds of slowness to attacked mobs per level
material.materialis.iesnium.encyclopedia: Allows the tool to harvest otherworld blocks
material.materialis.invar.encyclopedia: Puts out attacked mobs and deals 1 extra damage for every 1.5 seconds of fire multiplied by the level
material.materialis.ivory_psimetal.encyc: Adds up to 1 extra mining speed that scales with the amount of psi you have per level
material.materialis.neptunium.encycloped: 1.5x damage to submerged mobs, 5x mining speed when submerged
material.materialis.nickel.encyclopedia: Adds half a second of burning per level to targets that are on fire
material.materialis.osmium.encyclopedia: Adds 0.5 attack damage per level multiplied by the percentage of health lost
material.materialis.pewter.encyclopedia: -10% attack speed, +20% attack damage per level
material.materialis.pink_slime.encyclope: Takes 10% of mining speed and attack speed per level, 300 multiplied by the stats that were taken is added as overslime capacity
material.materialis.platinum.encyclopedi: Tool takes 100% extra durability damage per level
material.materialis.psimetal.encyclopedi: Casts the selected spell on block break for tools and on attack for weapons, also adds one spell socket
material.materialis.quicksilver.encyclop: Tool no longer takes durability damage from usages but has a 1% chance of losing durability every second
material.materialis.refined_glowstone.en: Adds the mining speed, multiplied by the level, divided by 20, to the attack speed
material.materialis.refined_radiance.enc: Applies 20 seconds of glowing to attacked mobs and leaves a glowing air block when a block is mined that despawns eventually
material.materialis.rose_quartz.encyclop: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part
material.materialis.rose_quartz.flavor: Disclaimer: Not actually made with roses.
material.materialis.shadow_steel.encyclo: Voids all dropped items from mob kills and broken blocks, drops bonus xp when killing mobs
material.materialis.starmetal.encycloped: Tool gains 2 mining speed per level at midnight
material.materialis.starmetal.flavor: Not to be confused with star cutting metal.
material.materialis.tungsten.encyclopedi: As the tool loses durability the chance of taking durability damage gradually decreases to 1%
material.materialis.uranium.encyclopedia: Tool takes up to twice as much durability damage when above half durability and increasingly less damage below half durability
material.materialis.utherium.encyclopedi: Deals 25% extra damage to rotspawn per level
modifier.materialis.adrenaline.descripti: Boosts attack damage when your health is low
modifier.materialis.arcane.description: Deals a small amount of extra magic damage to attacked targets
modifier.materialis.auxiliary_power.desc: Boosts your attack speed based on your mining speed
modifier.materialis.brittle.description: Tool takes much more durability damage
modifier.materialis.colorized.descriptio: Adds a decorative colorizer to your tool
modifier.materialis.create_wrenching.des: Tool can dismantle kinetic components by sneak-right clicking
modifier.materialis.daredevil.descriptio: Boosts mining speed when your health is low
modifier.materialis.decay.description: Your tool doesn't use durability on use but instead decays over time
modifier.materialis.economical.descripti: Repairing your tool is cheaper when your tool has low durability
modifier.materialis.enhanced_quartz.desc: Rose quartz goes great with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.materialis.featherweight.descri: Decreases attack damage but increases attack speed
modifier.materialis.galvanized.descripti: Trades two upgrade slots for an ability slot
modifier.materialis.half_life.descriptio: Your tool loses durability faster when it has high durability and loses durability slower when it has low durability
modifier.materialis.inertia.description: Decreases attack speed but increases attack damage
modifier.materialis.neptunes_blessing.de: Increases mining speed underwater and damage to wet mobs
modifier.materialis.nocturnal.descriptio: gives bonus mining speed during the night, most powerful at midnight
modifier.materialis.old_timer.descriptio: Repairing your tool is more expensive when your tool has high durability
modifier.materialis.otherworldly.descrip: Allows the tool to harvest blocks from The Other Place
modifier.materialis.overweight.descripti: Eats some mining speed and attack speed to gain more overslime capacity
modifier.materialis.polished.description: Deals more damage at a higher durability
modifier.materialis.polished.flavor: I can see my face in it!
modifier.materialis.psicho_digger.descri: Adds bonus mining speed depending on how much psi you currently have
modifier.materialis.psicho_killer.descri: Deals bonus attack damage depending on how much psi you currently have
modifier.materialis.psionizing_radiation: Your tool is highly conductive to psions and is suitable for casting spells, +1 spell socket
modifier.materialis.quenching.descriptio: Extinguishes mobs and deals bonus damage depending on how much longer the mob would have burned
modifier.materialis.reaping.description: Killing undead mobs will destroy their bodies and crystallize their souls, seems to have an affection towards scythes
modifier.materialis.refueling.descriptio: Attacked mobs that are on fire will burn for longer
modifier.materialis.residual_light.descr: Leaves behind pieces of light (photons) when hitting mobs leaving them glowing or when breaking blocks leaving the air glowing for some time
modifier.materialis.runed.description: Tool glows with a colored enchantment glint
modifier.materialis.spell_casting.descri: Adds the ability to cast spells on right-click but removes the ability to cast spells on block breaking and attacking, +1 spell socket
modifier.materialis.spell_socket.descrip: Adds one psi spell socket to your tool
modifier.materialis.thermal_wrenching.de: Tool can dismantle thermal machines by sneak-right clicking
modifier.materialis.underlord.descriptio: Deals more damage to non-boss undergarden mobs and mines undergarden blocks faster
modifier.materialis.voiding.description: Voids block and mob drops, drops extra experience for killing mobs
modifier.materialis.work_hardened.descri: Your tool loses durability slower when it has low durability
modifier.materialis.wrenching.descriptio: Tool can rotate blocks by right clicking
recipe.materialis.add_modifier.too_many_: This change adds too many sockets to the tool
recipe.materialis.modifier.casting_requi: Casting requires Psionizing Radiation to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.create_wrench: Mechanical Wrenching requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.thermal_wrenc: Thermal Wrenching requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.remove_modifier.spell_: This change removes a socket that currently contains a spell
